name: Rise from the Bottom
author: A4漫业
content: The most powerful Blade King in the empire, Laycil&#039s grandfather was executed for treason by the empire and the rest of his family was wiped out. From that moment on, Laycil&#039s life changed drastically. Laycil was enslaved, humiliated, and subjected to human experiments. These experiments included being implanted with dark demon cells. Laycil was completely trampled on as someone at the bottom of this world. However, during a conflict with a bully, he awakened the power of the dark demon,
